snippet.title: Sonic Forces [Super Sonic DLC] (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
The Super Sonic DLC's out now, so here's a quick video showing how it works.

Essentially:
- If you want to use Super Sonic you'll need to select that before going into the level
- Sonic automatically transforms upon collecting 50 rings (unless during an automated section, grind rail etc.), unlike other games where you need to input a button press
- Super Sonic's themes are both remixes of Fist Bump

---

Watch the Sonic Forces longplay:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7yae_Lo4stQ
